review_data.title: Hervorragend

review_data.title: A super fun resraurant

review_data.title: Stylish restaurant

review_data.title: Worst tempura in town
review_data.content: Just trying to eat a 4 piece 24chf tempura that is cold and served with old mayo. Then being told that is normal...great way to make friends...love the concept...hate the attitude...thanks for nothing. Other spots in there are lovely and so is the business manager.

review_data.title: Good food, overpriced
review_data.content: It was the first place where I ate in Zurich. The food was nice and my family liked it. Also the staff was friendly and helpful while choosing the food. However it is overpriced.

review_data.title: Food is good, but overpriced and slow service

review_data.title: My first experience here was very different from other reviewers

review_data.title: Good concept, but overpriced
review_data.content: Way better than the PicNic that was here before, still a bit of a strange concept. The sushi is decent, the sandwiches as well, would avoid the momos they have. Wine bar in the shop is massively overpriced.

review_data.title: Crazy expensive...Street food concept but you pay as you are eating in a Michelin starred restaurant
review_data.content: Sushi ok (nothing special) but crazy espensive and price not transparent. 40$ for a bowl of rice and two nigiri? When I have to order food and drinks from 3 different spots and grab all the stuff myself? Really?

review_data.title: Expensive... and not value for money
review_data.content: Sushis are ok. Nothing incredible...Old PIC-NIC refurbished. Only the price has MASSIVELY changed and to the upside ! They really took the lift. For example : 4 sushis plates at the sushi train... More than 80.- CHF. Can you imagine ?

review_data.title: Lunch/dinner in Zurich
review_data.content: Very delicious and nice food with a wonderful atmosphere and service! I really recommend this place! 😍
